column5: An elegant and unusual turn-of-the-century bedroom suite anchors the Master Suite. Lounge on the king-size featherbed or relax on the loveseat (sofa bed, for children or an extra guest) in front of the fireplace. The oversized bath (with shower) was originally the family nursery. Includes a full gourmet breakfast served at guests' discretion.
column8: The Master Suite at the Pecan Street Inn
